features: 【Exquisite Set】You will get an exquisite mechanical pencil set! Contains 3pcs 0.5mm & 0.7mm pastel mechanical pencils, 6 tubes of lead refills(360Pcs), 9pcs eraser refills and 3pcs erasers( pink, purple, blue ).
【Rubber Grip】The soft rubber pencil grip provides comfortable writing and painting, anti-slip and long writing without fatigue. Children and adults can use them easily.
【Cute Colors】Three candy-colored mechanical pencils are loved by girls and are great for writing, drawing, sketching, drawing, and everyday use.
【360PCS Upgraded Resin Lead】The lead is made of high-quality resin and graphite, which is more durable than ordinary lead, not easy to break and smooth to write.
【100% Satisfied Service】If you have any dissatisfaction with the mechanical pencil set, please contact us in time, we will provide you with a satisfactory answer within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Four Candies 6PCS Mechanical Pencil Set for Writing & Drawing Why choose Four Candies Pastel Mechanical Pencils? Lovely Colors - Aesthetic mechanical pencils are perfect for student classroom use.Soft Rubber Grip - Long writing time without fatigue, providing you with a comfortable writing experience.Higher Quality Lead Refills - [360pcs] Extra large capacity lead re, not easy to break lead, smooth writing.Great for Office, School & Home - Four Candies Mechanical Pencils are ideal for gifts for kids, girls and friends.

Comfortable Grip & Smooth Writing This mechanical pencil comes with a soft rubber grip for easy writing and protects your fingers from painful writing. Mechanical Pencil for Students Cute mechanical pencil set perfect for students and teachers, ideal pencil set for exams or writing. Mechanical Pencils for Drafting Four Candies mechanical pencil set is available in 0.5mm & 0.7mm, which can be used for drawing, drafting or sketching, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really happy with this set
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Four Candies Pastel Mechanical Pencil Set - 6PCS 0.5 mm & 0.7 mm & 0.9 mm Cute Mechanical Pencils with 360PCS HB Lead Refills, 3PCS Erasers and 9PCS Eraser Refills, Led Pencils Mechanical for Writing.I am not a fan of mechanical pencils because they seem to frustrate me after minimal use...lead breakage, can't figure out how to reload, eraser is junk, etc. However, the lack of sharpeners in classrooms has kind-of forced my hand to purchase another set. I hate the little sharpeners for regular pencils because it never fails that at some point it explodes little led and wood shavings all over my bag.The items shifted a bit during shipping but overall came adorably packaged like the picture. I love how the pencils and matching led are color coordinated and they come with a matching block eraser for each set. Love that! All the colors are beautiful, perfectly, pastel colors! The price point for everything that came in the set is amazing. Nothing in this set feels cheaply made. These are so pretty and came with all of the extras that I might need to get me through this semester. There are 2 pencils in every color and led size.For me they are perfect and so much better than I could have hoped for! They are comfortable to write with. They feel more like a pen than a pencil in my hand, which I like. They come in 3 different led sizes: 0.5mm (pink), 0.7mm (blue), and 0.9mm (purple). The only part that made me sad is that the pink set is for 0.5mm led. I much prefer the larger led (0.9mm) but they all write nicely. Each case of led contains 60 pieces. That is 120 extra pieces of led for each size!Oh, and the erasers! They actually work! the little, tiny erasers and the block erasers! They both actually erase the pencil! In the picture attached I wrote part of a math problem, erased part of it with the block, then erased another part with the tiny pencil-top eraser. Of course, the block eraser is better but they both are acceptable. AND they give you 9 extra (pencil-top) erasers!Thankfully, my two kiddos prefer the other two led sizes, so they weren’t a waste. I like these pencils so much I am taking one of the purple pencil sets (pencil and led case) to work to use and leaving the other in my pencil case for school. There is so much in this set. I can’t believe it was as affordable as it was. I highly recommend this set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute and Well Organized
reviews.reviewText: This pencil kit is super cute. The pastel colors of each pencil has matching erasers and lead holders in each color. There are two lead holders on each color for each size of lead (one in 0.7 and one in 0.5mm) since each color of pencil comes in each size. There are additional replacement eraser inserts which is nice since most mechanical pencils don’t come with extras. No one likes a nubby eraser. The pencils have comfortable grips to help with that sore writers bump if you have to write for an extended time. They are pretty light weight. I tend to like a heavier pencil but they’re still pretty good quality for what I paid. Overall a great value for the price.

reviews.reviewText: My daughter loved it so much. The eraser is so cute and works so good they’re really practical and improve my daughters writing everything was great about it and had great material andSet at a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good pencils
reviews.reviewText: These pencil are very good and durable. I take these pencils to school and i lend them to a bunch of my friends and they end up getting thrown around but never broken that’s the best part usually i have a mechanical pencil and i lend it to one of my friends it ends up breaking with in seconds so this was a good Suprise when i found out they last and don’t break easily. Another benefit i got from these pencil was the appearance. Me personally i study or do work a lot quicker when everything i have looks good and cute these pencils for example help me work a lot faster and motivate me to study. I bought these pencils for my mom and my cousin they love them every time i go to there house i see them use it. That’s why i think and most people should agree that’s these pencils are very good and amazing.

reviews.reviewText: I saw these on TikTok as well, but they were able to be shipped faster here on Amazon. I absolutley love them. Very comfortable, erasers actually work well, some times erasers don't work at all. Will purchase again if needed, but will purchase for gifts.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The erasers that come in the pencil are small and a little flimsy but it’s good product!
reviews.reviewText: It’s so good comes with lead refills and eraser refills one thing is that the erasers are rlly small but it comes with three big erasers so that’s nice. They are rlly easy to use literally js use it like a regular mechanical pencil. They come with 0.7 lead refills and 0.5 lead refills. Overall this is a rlly good product definitely recommend it’s worth it.

I love these pencils. They made me want to use pencils again. The case is sturdy, the pencils look good, and it comes with so many extra leads and erasers. In fact, I bought a set for a family member, too.

It’s very cute and good for use but there’s a catch it’s fragile and for light writers also breaks really easily. Especially easers break quickly (when I say quickly I mean really quickly. Thank hope this helps

The product is very cool and nice, also the package is good not damaged, delievery was fast! The pencil was easy to hold and very aesthetic :D I also love the color! The leather is wiped clean without leaving any traces, this combination also includes a pencil lead and a small eraser on the top of the pencil as a replacement. I think the seller is very considerate! very good buying experience!!! Maybe it's a little bit expensive but definitely buying again :)
